title: Welcome to My Blog!

content: This is the first post on my upgraded portfolio blog. Stay tuned for more updates and technical deep-dives!

title: Building a Scalable Portfolio
author: Sean Etienne
excerpt: How I upgraded my portfolio to support dynamic content, analytics, and CMS integration.
content: In this post, I share the process of upgrading my portfolio to support dynamic content, analytics, and future CMS integration. The stack includes React, JSON data, and more.
